```{r fit linear function, include=TRUE}

#Fit linear model
y_hat <- data$logY
logX1 <- data$logX1
logX2 <- data$logX2
logX3 <- data$logX3
logX4 <- data$logX4

linear_mod <- lm(y_hat ~ logX1 + logX2 + logX3 + logX4)

plot(linear_mod)

```
